Content:: ...And Other Officials (Russian: ...И другие официальные лица, romanized: ...I drugie ofitsialnye litsa) is a 1976 Soviet drama film directed by Semyon Aranovich.[1][2][3] A trade agreement between a Western oil company and Soviet industrialists may not take place. The head of the western delegation suddenly began to demand the replacement of a representative of the USSR.[4]
Title: ...And Other Officials - Wikipedia
